summary: The diff implements REQ-1 comprehensively across all required components. The browser tab title in index.html shows 'मस्जिद ए गौसिया वेलफेयर कमिटी', the Header displays the organization name and location in Hindi, HeroSection shows the name and 'महराजगंज, जौनपुर', AboutSection uses the full Hindi name with location, ContactSection includes the full address, and DonateSection references the organization name and location. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.
